body: You may activate and quench your elemental assault ability multiple times per day.
name: Incremental Elemental Assault
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sulis/New Racial Rules/Suli Feats/Incremental Elemental Assault

sections.body: You may use your elemental assault ability in 1-round increments, up to a maximum number of rounds per day equal to your character level. These rounds do not have to be consecutive. Activating the ability is a swift action; ending it is a free action.
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Sulis/New Racial Rules/Suli Feats/Incremental Elemental Assault/Benefits
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You can use elemental assault once per day. It lasts a number of rounds equal to your class level.
sections.name: Normal
